original_title: The Museum of the Lost and Found: gaakaazootaadiwag
overview: The story focuses on a fictional museum whose exhibits are all items from the Lost and Found boxes of the world. It’s located out in the woods and you can only visit if invited. While the story focuses on the tour guide and the exhibits, in reality, it’s an allegory about how our society treats missing person cases (specifically MMIWG2S).
title: The Museum of the Lost and Found: gaakaazootaadiwag
